alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey; Vanderburgh (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 27 at 8:34PM EDT until September 27 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Vanderburgh County in southwestern Indiana... South central Gibson County in southwestern Indiana... Northeastern Posey County in southwestern Indiana... North central Henderson County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 733 PM CDT, two severe thunderstorms were located near New Harmony, and near Mount Vernon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Evansville, Henderson, Mount Vernon, Melody Hill, Haubstadt, Darmstadt, Poseyville, Cynthiana, Blairsville, and Kasson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 3, and between Mile Markers 14 and 20. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 5 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
